title: Stoll - Hochtechnologie im Dritten Reich - Reichsdeutsche Entwic
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german. English title would be: Stoll - High technology in 3rd Reich - Reichgerman&#039;s developements and supposed true origin of UFOs (2004).  Alex Stoll explains how the physics of german flying saucers was supposed look, has some very technical chapters, 250 pages, many pictures.
